article_title: GUEST ESSAY: The middle class is vanishing

article_metadata.description: Thousands of USA factories have been closed over the past 30-plus years. Greedy corporations and many members of Congress have sent our American manufacturing and domestic jobs to foreign countries. They literally have been moving them out of our country for well over 35 years.They have hereby knowingly and meticulously been eliminating our jobs that will never return unless we are willing to accept those jobs for their minuscule wages and benefits to compete with the global economic system.
article_metadata.author: Raymond Barend
